Bartholomew the Bear Cub

Bartholomäus das Bärenjunge

Bartholomew the Bear Cub
kDesc
Bartholomew isn't as big and grizzly as some of his cousins. He's smaller, friendlier and generally better suited to being a household pet! [#Legal]
Bartholomée n'est pas aussi grand et terrifiant que certains de ses cousins. Il est plus petit, amical et généralement plus adapté à la vie d'animal de compagnie ! [#Legal]
Bartholomäus ist nicht so riesig wie die Grizzlys und seine anderen Verwandten. Er ist kleiner, freundlicher und ganz allgemein viel besser als Haustier geeignet! [#Legal]
Bartholomew non è così grosso e pericoloso come alcuni dei suoi cugini. È più piccolo, amichevole e generalmente perfetto come animale domestico! [#Legal]
Bartolo no será tan grande y temible como muchos de sus primos, pero es cariñoso y apto para tenerlo como mascota en casa. [#Legal]
小柄なバーソロミュー君は横暴な従兄弟と大違い。小さくて人懐こくてペットに最適！ \n※このアイテムはポータブルアイテムです。 [#Legal]
바솔로뮤는 다른 그의 사촌들처럼 크거나 회색곰은 아닙니다. 하지만 그 녀석은 더 작고 순해서 그냥 집에서 애완동물로 키우기에 더 적합합니다! [#Legal]
Bartholomew isn't as big and grizzly as some of his cousins. He's smaller, friendlier and generally better suited to being a household pet! [#Legal]
巴薩羅繆體型沒有牠的近親們大，也沒有牠們的毛色。牠體型較小，也更友好，是更理想的家庭寵物。 [#Legal]
巴薩羅繆體型沒有牠的近親們大，也沒有牠們的毛色。牠體型較小，也更友好，是更理想的家庭寵物。 [#Legal]
Bartholomew isn't as big and grizzly as some of his cousins. He's smaller, friendlier and generally better suited to being a household pet! [#Legal]
